meta.name: Generals Of Stampadia Full Core Set
meta.description: A set of 60 Units, 60 Places, 60 Events, and a quick reference card to play the game's full version.
meta.flavorText: The Sacred Printer will keep printing Units and send them against you, so you've to hold your ground... By stealing its paper and printing your army!
meta.author: KesieV

deck.name: Sacred Printer
deck.description: Touch the Printer Deck.
deck.flavorText: "The Sacred Printer... is printing an entire army against me!"

deck.name: Overloaded Printer
deck.description: Accept your destiny. (When you win this battle: tear up this card)
deck.flavorText: "There is no other choice... destroy it!"

deck.name: Tree Man
deck.description: When discarding 1 of your defeated Units: draw 1 of its Unit Cards.
deck.flavorText: "Take this card. It's a memento of your failure."

deck.name: Computer Man
deck.description: When 1 of your Units attacks: infuse it with 1 Element of your choice.
deck.flavorText: "It was a weak card. Total lack of synergy."

deck.name: Water Chest
deck.description: Discard 2 {water} Unit Cards: draw 3 cards.

deck.name: Fire Chest
deck.description: Discard 1 {fire} Unit Card: discard 1 Unit Card from any Enemy.

deck.name: Earth Chest
deck.description: Discard 2 {earth} Unit Cards: draw 1 card and put it on a Player Row empty space.
deck.flavorText: "From the Earth, the messenger is born naked."

deck.name: Air Chest
deck.description: Discard 2 {air} Unit Cards.

deck.name: Jumping Clown
deck.description: Discard 1 Unit Card: move 1 of your Units to another Player Row empty space.

deck.name: Dancing Clown
deck.description: Discard 1 Unit Card: move 1 Enemy in front of 1 of your Units to another empty space.

deck.name: Blessed Tree
deck.description: Select 1 Unit Card from hand: add it face down to your Life.
deck.flavorText: You pick a Fruit from a blooming tree. It's so sweet.

deck.name: Cursed Tree
deck.description: Lose 1 Life.
deck.flavorText: You pick a Fruit from a rotten tree. It's so bitter.

deck.name: Higher Saint
deck.description: You have 2 Life or less: gain 1 Life.

deck.name: Lower Saint
deck.description: You have 1 Life or less: gain 1 Life.

deck.name: Shopkeeper
deck.description: Discard 1 Unit Card: draw 3 cards, pick 1, discard the other 2.

deck.name: Insurance Service
deck.description: Draw 2 cards.

deck.name: Critters
deck.description: Print level 1 Units on all Incoming Row empty spaces.

deck.name: Guardian
deck.description: Select 1 Incoming Row empty space: print a level 6 Unit there.
deck.flavorText: "Let me pass, adventurer! I've to save the monks!"

deck.name: Gambler
deck.description: Declare 1 Element: discard Printer Deck top card, draw 1 if the new top card infuses that Element.

deck.name: Bloody Gambler
deck.description: Declare 1 Element: discard Printer Deck top card, draw 2 if the new top card infuses that Element. Else, lose 1 Life.

deck.name: Steam Puzzle
deck.description: Discard 1 {fire} and 1 {water} Unit Cards: draw 2 cards.
deck.flavorText: You see a complex system of disconnected brass pipes.

deck.name: Sand Puzzle
deck.description: Discard 1 {earth} and 1 {air} Unit Cards: draw 2 cards.
deck.flavorText: You see an hourglass surrounded by metal spheres.

deck.name: Mercenary
deck.description: Discard 1 Unit Card: put this card in any empty space. On defeat: add this card to Place Stack.

deck.name: Bard
deck.description: Discard 1 Unit Card: add this card to 1 of your Units. On defeat: add this card to Place Stack.

deck.name: Strength Trainer
deck.description: Add this card to 1 of your Units with {attack}>1. On defeat: add this card to Place Stack, draw 1 card.

deck.name: Endurance Trainer
deck.description: Add this card to 1 of your Units with {life}>1. On defeat: add this card to Place Stack, draw 1 card.

deck.name: Golem Card
deck.description: Discard 1 {air} Unit Card.
deck.flavorText: Stampadians used to play a simple trading card game probably called The Beastcrafters.

deck.name: Manticore Card
deck.description: Discard 1 {fire} Unit Card.
deck.flavorText: Stampadians used to play a simple trading card game probably called The Beastcrafters.

deck.name: Hellhound Card
deck.description: Discard 1 {water} Unit Card.
deck.flavorText: Stampadians used to play a simple trading card game probably called The Beastcrafters.

deck.name: Siren Card
deck.description: Discard 1 {earth} Unit Card.
deck.flavorText: Stampadians used to play a simple trading card game probably called The Beastcrafters.

deck.name: Lost King
deck.description: You have less than 5 Life: shuffle this card face down with Life Cards, draw 1 card. When lost: add this card to Place Stack.

deck.name: Lost Old Sage
deck.description: You have less than 5 Life: shuffle this card face down with Life Cards. When lost: add this card to Place Stack, draw 2 cards.

deck.name: Necromancer
deck.description: Select 1 of your Units: discard its bottom card and draw the remaining cards if any.

deck.name: Cerimonial Knife
deck.description: Select 1 Enemy: discard its bottom card.
deck.flavorText: "The word of Preuk helped." - Ancient Book

deck.name: Time Machine
deck.description: Select 1 Unit from the Front Row: move it back to the Incoming Row.
deck.flavorText: The hostile Unit vanishes into thin air.

deck.name: Teleporter
deck.description: Select 1 Unit from the Front Row: move it to another empty space of the Front Row.

deck.name: Chased Prince
deck.description: In Recover Phase, have 1 or more shields: discard all shields.
deck.flavorText: "Nice reflexes! Thank you for saving me, adventurer!"

deck.name: Chased Queen
deck.description: In Recover Phase, have 1 or more shields: discard all shields, draw 1 card.
deck.flavorText: "Take this. You've defended the royal family!"

deck.name: Time Loop Breaker
deck.description: When you are defeated: draw 2 cards and keep playing.

deck.name: Time Loop Defender
deck.description: When you are defeated: turn this card and the game is over.

deck.title: Quick Reference
text: 5. Add as many {wound} as the attack value
7. Always check the attacker Unit defeat
8. {italic}If the attacker Unit is not defeated{enditalic}: exhaust it
